answers.answer: Share content with other users in Chatter
Add tags when editing content details

question: A user responsible for managing and creating campaigns is unable to create a new campaign, even though the user's profile has the "Create: profile permission for Campaigns.How should a system administrator grant the correct access to the user?

answers.answer: Assign the user to the standard Marketing User profile
Select the Marketing User checkbox on the user record
Grant the user delegated administration rights to campaigns
Create a campaign sharing rule to grant access to the user

question: What is a method for adding content to Salesforce CRM Content?
Which dashboard component can display data from the summary rows of a report?

A user at Universal Containers reports an error message when attempting to log in. The administrator checks the user's login history, but there's no record of the attempted login.What could be the cause of the issue?

answers.answer: The user is attempting to log in with wrong password.
The user is attempting to log in outside of the profile login hours.
The user is attempting to log in outside of the profile IP login range.
The user is attempting to log in with the wrong username.

question: Universal Containers currently assigns its users from the facilities and IT teams to the same profile. Universal Containers recently created a custom object to track company cars and wants only users from The facilities team to have access to this new object.How can an administrator meet this requirement?

answers.answer: Configure FLS on the new object for the facilities team
Assign the facilities team to a new role in the role hierarchy
Modify the standard profile currently shared by both teams
Create a custom profile for users on the facilities team

question: What must an administrator do when creating a record type?

answers.answer: set the field level security for the record type
create a new page layout for the record type
assign the record type to the appropriate profiles
add the record type to the required user records

question: What type of field allows users to input text, images, and links?
What should a system administrator consider when setting up Mobile Lite?

answers.answer: it must be enabled for the entire organization
it allows access to most custom objects in the organization
it allows access to all standard objects in the organization

question: Universal Containers set the organisation-wide defaults for cases to private. When a case is escalated, case ownership changes to a Tier 2.How can a system administrator give the sales operations team read/write access to all escalated cases?

answers.answer: Create a criteria based sharing rule

question: Universal Containers needs to synchronise data between Salesforce and external financial system.How can a system administrator accomplish this?

answers.answer: use an external ID field to match records between the systems
use the data loader to match records between the systems
use the data loader to upsert Salesforce records into the financial system
use the Excel connector to export records from both systems into Excel

question: The cloud scheduler has which capability?

answers.answer: the cloud scheduler allows users to view available meeting times on lead and contact calendars
Salesforce can automatically propose multiple meeting times based on Salesforce user calendars
the cloud scheduler can be enabled at the user profile level
a custom logo can be added to the meeting request email set to a contact or lead

question: Which statement about Chatter posts and comments is true?

answers.answer: Updates to the Chatter feed on a record are only visible to users with access to the record.
Posts to a user's profile can be made private by clicking the lock icon.
Posts to a user's profile are hidden from anyone below that user in the role hierarchy.
Posts made to a user's profile are visible to all users in the organization.

question: When can a validation rule be used to prevent invalid data?

answers.answer: when records are deleted by a user
when records are edited by a user
when records are submitted using web-to-lead
when records are updated by a workflow rule

use the data loader to move the custom lead data

use the lead conversion wizard to select the fields

question: The Support team at Universal Container wants to be more proactive about renewing support plans with customers. What setting is controlled by a user's profile?

answers.answer: Existing field values must be transferred to a new custom field.
Field values should be archived before a field is deleted.
Fields used in workflow and assignment rules cannot be deleted.
Deleted fields and values can be restored from the recycle bin within 15 hours.

answers.answer: filter by which users can narrow down results
number of records displayed for each object
field being searched for on each object

question: Universal Container is using a private sharing model. The U.S. sales director needs full access to all records owned by the U.S. sales representatives. How can this be accomplished?

answers.answer: define a role hierarchy where the U.S sales director rolls up to the CEO
define a role hierarchy where the U.S. sales representatives roll up to the sales director
give the U.S. sales director read/write/edit/delete object permission on the profile
place the U.S. sales director in a queue with the U.S. sales representatives

question: What does a page layout allow an administrator to control?

answers.answer: The business process and related picklist values displayed
The fields users see on detail and edit pages
The fields users see in reports and list views
The record types available to each role and profile.

question: What standard object has a one-to-many relationship with the account object?
Which level of access can be set when sharing a document folder with users?

answers.answer: opportunities for which the user running the report is also the account owner
opportunities for the entire sales organization regardless of the user running the report
opportunities owned by the user running the report and users below them in the role hierarchy
opportunities owned by the user running the report and users in the same role in the role hierarchy

question: Which statement about sharing rules is true?

answers.answer: sharing rules open up access of records
sharing rules are required in public read/write organizations
sharing rules grant delete access to records
